notes.text: Demo Kit: new demo apps landing page
activate sap_belize_hcb for sap.m
new demo apps landing page
sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: implement screen reader support
sap.f.semantic.SemanticPage: New control added
sap.m.ComboBox: Filter functionality for both columns
sap.m.ComboBoxBase: value state message is now displayed in dropdown list
sap.m.DatePicker - new "navigate" event added
sap.m.FormattedText: enable auto link detection
sap.m.GenericTile: Actions scope added
sap.m.GenericTile: Actions scope added to Explored sample
sap.m.GenericTile: Header and subheader texts truncated if LineMode is used in cozy mode
sap.m.GenericTile: Line mode added
sap.m.HeaderContainer: Control moved from sap.suite.ui.commons to sap.m
sap.m.IconTabBar: Tab drag-drop functionality implementation
sap.m.IconTabBar: Tab filters now support custom rendering
sap.m.Input: Improved suggestion filtering
sap.m.Input: Suggestion popup has additional "Avaliable Values" announcement
sap.m.LightBox: Popup has additional ARIA announcement
sap.m.ListItemBase: highlight property is added.
sap.m.MultiInput: Added tokenUpdate event
sap.m.MultiInput: Copy added
sap.m.MultiInput: Cut added
sap.m.MultiInput: Improved accessibility
sap.m.NotificationListGroup: Max notifications reached message added
sap.m.NotificationListGroup: New property 'enableCollapseButtonWhenEmpty' added"
sap.m.Panel: AccessibleRole property added
sap.m.PlanningCalendar - Hide select if only one view is available
sap.m.PlanningCalendar - new event rowHeaderClick created
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: One Month view for desktop.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: custom color for appointments and legend items
sap.m.QuickViewBase: Added navOrigin parameter
sap.m.Slider: Labels on tickmarks
sap.m.Slider: Revised: Tickmarks implementation
sap.m.SplitContainer: Additional ARIA announcements are added
sap.m.Tokenizer: Copy functionality has been added
sap.m.Tokenizer: Cut functionality has been added
sap.m.UploadCollection: Indicator of drag and drop implemented
sap.m.UploadCollection: Renderer for No Data indicator of sap.m.ListBase overwritten
sap.m.semantic.SemanticPage: Rule-set support
sap.m: Shared theme configuration for test pages
sap.ui.core: Shared configuration for test pages
sap.ui.layout.form.Form remove label colon
sap_belize_hcb for sap.m.B* to G* controls
Add timeout to prevent rendering errors in tests
Local less parameter fixes for sap_belize_plus
core.Popup: event handler should be moved to new DOM of autoclose area after rendering
disconnect @sapUiFieldDisabled* less parameters
fix transparency for buttons within a bar
m.DatePicker: OnChange compares previous and old value correctly
m.DatePicker: The picker calendar value is updated correctly after changes in the input
sap.m toggle states fixed
sap.m.ActionSheet: AriaLabelledby dependency to self of each button aded twice
sap.m.BarBase: text shadow for active states removed
sap.m.BarInPageEnabler: Memory leak fixed.
sap.m.BusyDialog: The dialog is no longer closed while navigating between pages
sap.m.Button states fixed
sap.m.Button: Emphasized button has correct contrast ratio
sap.m.Button: HCB Header and Footer buttons fixed
sap.m.Button: Sufficient contrast ratio in HCB for IE
sap.m.Button: button text in footer fixed
sap.m.Button: disabled border in bars fixed
sap.m.Button: disabled button border in bar/footer fixed
sap.m.Button: disabled state for semantic buttons
sap.m.Button: disabled state for semantic buttons
sap.m.Button: prevent the Safari from setting the focus to wrong place
sap.m.Carousel: Focus outline corrected
sap.m.Carousel: Navigation arrows focus in IE fixed
sap.m.Carousel: Scroll containers destroying now corrected
sap.m.ComboBox: remove double focus outline
sap.m.ComboBox: update the value after a new binding context is set
sap.m.ComboBoxTextField: Screen Reader behavior improved
sap.m.ComboBoxTextField: show default mouse pointer when disabled
sap.m.CustomListItem: FlexBox shrink workaround for IE.
sap.m.CustomTile: CSS file for HCB added in library.source.less file
sap.m.Dialog: Initial focus issue fixed
sap.m.Dialog: Issue in open method
sap.m.Dialog: Memory leaks have been fixed
sap.m.FacetFilter - all active lists can be deleted when there is also inactive.
sap.m.FacetFilter: Text shown correctly in Arabic
sap.m.FacetFilter: when the last selected item is deselected list does not remain active; 'All' logic in the filter name is partially restored.
sap.m.FeedListItem: Screenreader support improved
sap.m.FlexBox: Correct height if flex item is a scroll container
sap.m.FlexBox: Make sure ID on flex item is always rendered
sap.m.GenericTile: Default value of JS doc corrected
sap.m.GenericTile: Focus with background image improved
sap.m.GenericTile: Line height increased to fit Devanagari script
sap.m.GenericTile: LineMode border color in HCB corrected
sap.m.GenericTile: Mouse pointer handling enhanced
sap.m.GenericTile: Show full subheader in tooltip if truncated on tile
sap.m.GenericTile: Tiles no longer shift if no content is rendered
sap.m.GenericTile: User text selection for failed state corrected
sap.m.GenericTile: Visibility of content in Header Mode corrected
sap.m.GrowingEnablement: Correction in createListItem function.
sap.m.IconTabBar: "select" event is not fired any more when control is destroyed
sap.m.IconTabBar: Expanding is correct if no tab is selected
sap.m.IconTabBar: The filter icon has been fixed
sap.m.Input:  liveChange event is now fired correctly
sap.m.Input: Acc issue in Input fixed
sap.m.Input: Additional "suggestionNavigation" parameter to the 'liveChange' event is added
sap.m.Input: Alignment of value help icon under condensed mode fixed
sap.m.Input: RTL for numbers is now fixed
sap.m.Input: Role=textbox is no longer set
sap.m.Input: Scroll from table with suggestions fixed
sap.m.Input: ValueHelp position in condensed mode fixed
sap.m.Input: liveChange is fired when navigate through suggestions
sap.m.InputBase: IE throws input event without real trigger
sap.m.InputBase: Pressing backspace on disabled input doesn't navigate to previous page any more
sap.m.InputListItem: Input field should not shrink
sap.m.Link / sap.m.Text: Bold style in AnalyticalTable summary row
sap.m.Link hand cursor not always visible fixed
sap.m.Link: Dashed focus outline in IE
sap.m.List fixes
sap.m.ListItemBase: active border fixed
sap.m.ListItemBase: hover and active states fixed
sap.m.MessagePopoverItem: Type None now fallbacks to type Information
sap.m.MessageStrip: semantic borders fixed for hc themes
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Binding is now synchronized with SelectedItems association and SelectedKeys property
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Cutting of the tokenizer fixed
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Entering completely new value in the input is not possible
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Focus should not be restored to the input when a token is deleted on a phone
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Race condition with "SelectionFinish" event is now fixed
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Remove race condition between fireSelectionFinish event and setSelection method
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Rendering optimized
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Returning the focus to the input after rendering the list removed
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Selecting an item does not close the picker
sap.m.MultiComboBox: adjust events to enable multi-language input
sap.m.MultiComboBox: onsapenter now selects a value from the picker
sap.m.MultiInput: ARIA support is now correct
sap.m.MultiInput: Fixed methods getAggregation and clone
sap.m.MultiInput: Input value is visible when readonly
sap.m.MultiInput: Keyboard issues are now ok
sap.m.MultiInput: Layout no longer breaks on resize
sap.m.MultiInput: MultiInput is now correctly read as token container
sap.m.MultiInput: Pasted invalid value is no longer cleared
sap.m.MultiInput: SetEditable no longer modifies its tokens
sap.m.MultiInput: Suggestions + free text validation is now working correctly
sap.m.MultiInput: Token selection corrected
sap.m.MultiInput: open the dialog on phone when clicked instead of focused
sap.m.MultiInput: suggestionItemSelected event is now fired correctly
sap.m.NavContainer: popup would close, since navContainer only checked if the immediate parent was a popup
sap.m.NotificationListGroup: Group renders items correctly when no footer buttons are set
sap.m.NotificationListItem: Color of DateTime in the Notifications has been fixed
sap.m.NotificationListItem: toolbar hover fixed
sap.m.NotificationListitem: Color of DateTime in the Notifications has been corected
sap.m.NumericContent: API documentation updated
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: Correct color inside ColumnListItem
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: ARIA fixed
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Correctly aligned inside form
sap.m.OverflowToolbar's popover would cause the other popup to close
sap.m.Page: Logged errors for Page with usescaped id and footer are corrected
sap.m.Page: floating footer repaired
sap.m.Page: rendering performance
sap.m.Panel: Do not throw exception if .sapMPanelContent is not found
sap.m.Panel: Expandable icon contrast ratio fix
sap.m.Panel: content of Panel with animation is now drawn in IE
sap.m.PlanningCalendar - switching year in week view for negative time zones is corrected.
sap.m.Popover - Title wans't able to be set to an empty string
sap.m.Popover: Do not fire beforeClose event when the Popup is destroyed
sap.m.ProgressIndicator: long texts didn't truncate
sap.m.QuickView: Content size is now adapted correctly
sap.m.QuickView: Title text is now correctly displayed in two lines
sap.m.QuickViewPage: Content is now destroyed correctly
sap.m.RadioButton: Dot is now positioned correctly in compact mode
sap.m.RadioButton: Exit method should remove all instances from groups
sap.m.RadioButton: Text truncation in Safari adjusted
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Clone method detaches and ataches events properly
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Column view under mobile devices fixed
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Compact visual issues with alignment fixed
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: On-focus issue fixed
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Property binding issue
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Setters no longer modify RadioButtons' states
sap.m.RangeSlider - memory leak on rerendering
sap.m.RangeSlider prevent exceeding the range
sap.m.RangeSlider: Fixes progress line visual design
sap.m.RatingIndicator fix pixel calculation
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Focus contrast ratio in IE/Edge is now correct
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Icon only metrics for hcb fixed
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Icon size fixed
sap.m.SegmentedButton: border of selected fixed
sap.m.SegmentedButton: borders fixed
sap.m.Select: enable scrolling to the selected item when the selectList opens
sap.m.Select: overflow button hover in TabStripSelect fixed for hcb
sap.m.SleectList: incorrect layout when using columns mode on IE/EDGE
sap.m.SlideTile: Focus out behavior corrected
sap.m.SplitContainer: Console error _getAnyHeader now corrected
sap.m.SplitContainer: Master view properly closing issue
sap.m.StandardTile: MonitorType active fixed
sap.m.StepInput - "change" event is fired.
sap.m.StepInput: Increase and decrease buttons have tooltips
sap.m.Switch: fix handle background
sap.m.Switch: hidden label's value wasn't updated when moving the switch
sap.m.TabContainer - when items are rebound, default selected item is properly updated.
sap.m.TabContainer: Close button inside the select list is now positioned correctly in IE
sap.m.TabStrip: Focus corrected for IE
sap.m.TabStrip: border bottom fixed in hcb
sap.m.TabStripSelect: select button fixed
sap.m.Table: set padding only on the left for row highlight
sap.m.Text: Spacing between paragraphs is now correct on iPhone
sap.m.Text: Text align under Vertical Layout fixed
sap.m.TextArea: set the height correctly
sap.m.TileContainer explored app. sample binds icon property correctly.
sap.m.TileContainer: hover on previous and next buttons fixed
sap.m.TimePicker - when destroyed all mask rules are destroyed as well.
sap.m.TimePicker: Correctly displayed in Belize
sap.m.TimePicker: displayFormat now correctly ignored when value is bound
sap.m.Title: Header Sizes fixed
sap.m.Title: JSDoc of level and titleStyle properties corrected
sap.m.Token: Delete event is now fired properly
sap.m.Tokenizer: Scrolling not working properly in chrome now corrected
sap.m.Tokenizer: tokenUpdate fired when tokens are cut
sap.m.Tree: ChildNodes Failure in Mockserver with MockData
sap.m.Tree: read edit botton
sap.m.Tree: update expander information in set binding context
sap.m.UploadCollection: File deletion during upload corrected
sap.m.UploadCollection: Focus handling in Upload Pending scenario improved
sap.m.UploadCollectionItem: JSDoc for property enableDelete fixed
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog - calling method removeAllSortItems() does not throw an exception if no items exist.
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Dialog appears always
sap.m.Wizard - Removed most of the scrollLocks, fixed chaining of nextStep().nextStep() and previousStep().previousStep()
sap.m.Wizard: Next button on a tablet is not aligned
sap.m.WizardStep - prevent usage of setVisible method for WizardSteps as it makes no sense and is not supported
sap.m.delegate.ValueState: always set aria-describedby attribute to the focusable element
sap.m.delegate.ValueStateMessage: MaxWidth issue
sap.ui.core.Popup: enable restore focus on mobile device
sap_belize fixes for ActionSelect
: sap.m.ColumnListItem: focus outline workaround for IE
m.TimePicker: Updated jsdoc of precision properties introduced in 1.40
